description:
We proudly present MONUMENTAL TORMENT’s debut full-length album. 
Being on different sides of the globe three musicians managed to step up their level of musicianship in order to satisfy every single fan of extreme technicality.    On this masterpiece you’ll get 10 insane tracks of tech death metal for fans of ORIGIN, VIRAEMIA and BENEATH THE MASSACRE. Layout works made by three different artists.

http://www.facebook.com/MonumentalTorment
www.myspace.com/monumentaltorment

name: Painful Defloration - "Antihuman Antisocial" CD
description:
You want intense furious hatred? Headsplitting blastbeats? Braindrilling catchy melodies? Here comes PAINFUL DEFLORATION with its third full-length album “Antihuman Antisocial”. Incredible mix of grindcore and hardcore put together as the most extreme sound-cake. For fans of intense grindcore like NASUM and KILL THE CLIENT. Absolutely astonishing stuff!

Listen and buy digital download: http://sfcrecords.bandcamp.com/album/antihuman-antisocial

Track list:

1. Don`t Stop Violence
2. Grind Till You Doe
3. Subculture Genocide
4. Stand For Nihilism
5. Lack Of Reality
6. The Loud Underground
7. Beyond All Lies
8. Antihuman Antisocial
9. Of False Authorities
10. Alone But Strong
11. Profit For Golden Coffin
12. Hatred Gave Me Wings
13. The Gallows Swing
14. Comin' Home

name: Gutted - "Mankind Carries The Seeds of Hell" CD
description:
The third album «Mankind Carries The Seeds Of Hell» will bring chill, crawling up your spine. On this CD GUTTED plays talented and professionally composed brutal death metal in its darkest way. Uncompressed sound fully exaggerate the atmosphere of medieval brutality in this pure masterpiece of extremely fast technical brutal death metal. Artwork made by mighty Hjules.

Listen and buy digital download: http://sfcrecords.bandcamp.com/album/mankind-carries-the-seeds-of-hell

Track list:

1. As The Sun Paints Everything Black
2. Memory Devourer
3. Lurking in The Shadow
4. When The Gods are Not Creating
5. World of Mine
6. Souls of The Raped Children
7. Take Them to Hell's Fire
8. The Fountain

name: Leptotrichia - "The Repository" CD
description:
A newborn brutal abortion LEPTOTRICHIA creates a ravaging wall of technical composing and psychotic heavy riffing bringing back the best traditions of SUFFOCATION, SEVERED SAVIOUR, DEEDS OF FLESH. The debut full-length piece of high-class sonic torment called "The Repository" symbolizes a big step forward in Belgium brutal death metal scene and pretends to be a must-have for all true death metal warriors all over the world.
CD Mastered by Wieslawscy Brothers @ Studio Herz (Poland).

Listen and buy digital download: http://sfcrecords.bandcamp.com/album/mankind-carries-the-seeds-of-hell

http://facebook.com/pages/LEPTOTRICHIA/324872970179
www.myspace.com/leptotrichia

name: Human Parasite - "Proud To Build The Insidious Catastrophe" CD
description:
Crushing debut album from this French band! Pretend to be torn into pieces by the inhuman slams, destructive blastbeats and the highest sound quality you could imagine in such genre. A deadly mix between INTERNAL BLEEDING and old DYING FETUS taking the best from these bands and striking you uncompromisingly and heavily

Listen and buy digital download: http://sfcrecords.bandcamp.com/album/proud-to-build-insidious-catastrophe

http://www.facebook.com/pages/HUMAN-PARASITE/229437291722

name: Cephalic Impurity - "Unique Brute Revival" CD
description:
Newest album of this brutal death maniacs.
It is absolutely new level for the band, great composing, professional recording and mastering in Navaho studio, clean powerful sound, crushing riffing and drumming.

Listen and buy digital download: http://sfcrecords.bandcamp.com/album/unique-brute-revival

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Cephalic-Impurity/145316618828707

name: Acephala - "Division by Zero" CD
description:
UA top brutal death maniacs Acephala unchain their second act of violent bestiality «Division By Zero» spiced with fast blasting parts, carnivorous low growls, skillfully distorted sound and a great deal of catchy slamming breakdown groovage maximizing the total level of violence in this release. Undoubtedly the most promising Ukrainian brutal death metal act in recent years, which can’t be missed and can’t be forgotten. Missing this album is as impossible as division by zero!

Listen and buy digital download: http://sfcrecords.bandcamp.com/album/division-by-zero

www.myspace.com/acephala

name: Fitcage - "Pigumanity" CD
description:
Russian grind scene has never seen such an extreme grindcore assault as Fitcage which delivers ultrafast and offensive material bringing together the chaos and rawness of old-school grindfreaks and earache heaviness of modern quality bands. Awesome Mumakil and Rotten Sound oriented stuff for die-hard extreme fans. This is pure wall of hatred up your fucking ears! Survive one of the most furious releases ever! 

Listen and buy digital download: http://sfcrecords.bandcamp.com/album/pigumanity

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Fitcage/101524686572822
www.myspace.com/fitcage

name: Outcast - "Mass Murder Fantasies" CD
description:
Severe death metal act Outcast from Belgium attacks with its first full-length album “Mass Murder Fantasies” pouring with deranged blasts and pounding mid-tempo riffage in order to make everyone who listens to them fantasize about mass murder. No guts no glory as well as no mercy and no surrender for fans of brutal death stuff. Outcast will reveal all their internal insanity and anger all over your ears! Get ready for mass murder fantasies! 

Listen and buy digital download: http://sfcrecords.bandcamp.com/album/mass-murder-fantasies

www.myspace.com/massmurderfantasies

name: Scrambled Defuncts - "Souls Despising the God" CD
description:
After long time Scrambled Defuncts returns with their third full length album “Souls Despising the God”. Extremely brutal technical death metal in the best veins of this genre mixed with avant-garde philharmonic orchestra music. Never before you’ve heard this kind of mix between two genres. Open your mind for this fierce symbiosis to get some unforgettable experience. Expect everything but no indifference and disappointment to this masterpiece of pure millennium technicality!

Listen and buy digital download: http://sfcrecords.bandcamp.com/album/souls-despising-the-god

www.myspace.com/scrambleddefuncts

name: Murder Intentions - "A Prelude to Total Decay"
description:
“A Prelude To Total Decay” hardly can be placed in strict stylistic frameworks. Style of this young Belgian band is energetic Death metal, with expression of Grindcore and severe straightforwardness of Hardcore. Each of 9 songs moves very aggressively, constantly keeping in suspense, and remaining in memory after the first listening. Album mastering done by Robbe K. (Disavowed)

www.myspace.com/murderintentions

description:
The drawn whores on meat hooks and vomiting of pleasure. Improbable release from the north of Russia! Qualitative sound and shocking artwork from Mottla Art Studio. Swift, technical and sick brutality in vein of Disgorge (US), Guttural Secrete, Malignancy. 15 songs with original structures in the the innovative approach!
Taste this debut "Gruesome Forms of Distorted Libido".

Listen and buy digital download: http://sfcrecords.bandcamp.com/album/gruesom-forms-of-distorted-libido

http://www.facebook.com/pages/PERVERSE-DEPENDENCE/156680404387267
www.myspace.com/perversedependence

name: Sickening Horror - "The Dead End Experiment" CD
description:
Sickening Horror's brand new second album entitled "The Dead End Experiment" is available now! Dark and morbid atmosphere prevails during all 10 tracks and every song is filled with memorable and catchy riffs. This CD is full of Experiments but still top-notch death metal stuff.
The recordings, mixing and mastering took place at Portal studio, Athens. Guest vocals by Ross Dolan (Immolation), Artwork was done by Marko Saarelainen.

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Sickening-Horror/339645305561
www.myspace.com/sickeninghorror

name: Prejudice - "Megalomanic Infest" CD
description:
Death Metal's most savagely uncompromising sicko's PREJUDICE are back with a NEW album with 2 sick lead singers. Insanely fast, brutal, groove laden and technically beyond compare. PREJUDICE once again raise the benchmark for the extreme with “Megalomanic Infest”. Unmatched in its complexity, brutality and incomprehensible to all but the enlightened. PREJUDICE hierarchical philosophy is emphasized with every blast, every demented lead, every scream and for every second of this nerve-shredding, jaw dropping example of what elite Death Metal music is all about. WELCOME TO THE NEW BREED… Welcome to “MEGALOMANIC INFEST”
Recorded at the Excess studio(Gorefest, Severe torture, Disavowed) mixed by Chris Van Der valk for Homegrown recordings (Hail of bullets, Gorefest, Emeth...) and mastered by COLIN DAVIS(VILE, Imperial mastering)

www.myspace.com/prejudice

name: Prejudice - "Megalomanic Infest" Combo package deal
description:
This package include:

Logo t-shirt
New album CD

name: 40GRADI - "Hi-tech Re-search"
description:
Hi-tech Re-search - is a mix of Czech style goregrind and fast slide-grind, what makes sound of this album unique! Absolutely insane riffs, inhuman vocals and ultra-fast drums overfill this CD. 18 minutes more the enough to make your brain jelly!
Album was recorded at Moltencore studio (Croatia). Mixed and mastered by Brain (Jig-Ai, Eardelete, Psychotic Despair). Art-work was done by Jarda (Alienation Mental)

www.myspace.com/40gradi

name: 40GRADI - "Hi-tech Re-search" T-shirt
description: Orange and Green T-shirt

name: Epitome - "supeROTic experience"
description:
Second full-length album from one of oldest European goregrind band is available now! On the new album you'll get a fresh version of “pathological sound formula”, as a result of almost 20 years of development. When you'll hear this CD, you'll remind old Regurgitate, Dead Infection and Blood. Simple and memorizable goregrind from middle 90th, improved by heavy sound and easy portrayal! So if you like it, you should get it. 

www.myspace.com/epitomeofficialsite

name: Epitome - "supeROTic experience" T-shirt
description: White and Grey shirts

name: Ion Disruption - "Troops of Eternal War"
description:
No one needs to introduce about death metal. If you can remind Morbid Angel, Cannibal Corpse, Deicide, etc – just listen to “Troops of eternal war”! Furious and bloodlust, maybe primitive and simple, mixed with catchy leads, steps that make you impressed. Cold grin of the war is the leading character on the CD.
This is death metal that doesn’t need any additional genre notes!

www.myspace.com/iondisruption

name: Painful Defloration - "Esthetic Research Laboratory"
description:
SFC presents second full-length album of Ukrainian grindcore band. On this CD they offer you new vision of esthetic grindcore, with perfect compositions and smashing sound! Despite of definition, all this still good old grindcore, with blast-beats, dancing pieces and sensation of a total intoxication! Their stuff cannot crush your mind, but it just swiftly shake your head out!
To increase impression from listening, CD is supplied with mastering from Brain (Jig-Ai, Eardelete) and incredible artwork from Parasite For Art. 

www.myspace.com/painfuldeflorationband

name: Cerebral Incubation - "Asphyxiating on Excrement" CD
description:
Total slamming butchery comes from Nevada, USA. Cerebral Incubation is a follower of slam wave in brutal death metal world, who made not only "promo songs" for mayspace. Solid sound, groovy riffs, sick vocals overfill this CD. 6 pages layout with cover-art from Visual Darkness (Guttural Secrete, Sinister, Cephalotripsy, Grave, Pathology)

www.myspace.com/cerebralincubation

name: Cephalic Impurity - "Perverted Surgical Concept" CD
description:
Debut album of Russian tech-slam-death machine Cephalic Impurity unleashes horrifying mix of technical brutality and unstoppable dynamic groovage with extremely low gutturals and unexpected rhythm changes. A new level of modern slamming brutal death scene!

www.myspace.com/cephalicimpurity

name: Purulent Jacuzzi - "Stench Of The Drowned Carrion"
description:
Astonishing debut of Russian brutal goregrind band PURULENT JACUZZI throws 29 songs of completely deranged and extreme stuff right into your face taking after the sickest goregrind bands in the world such as LDOH and Foetopsy. A gruesome and violent discovery from Moscow suburbs. You can’t miss it!

www.myspace.com/pjacuzzi

name: Thelema - "Fearful Symmetry"
description:
THELEMA is pretty original band in its music, more to say great one. They mixed such styles like progressive and death metal, as well as something like funk tunes in their music. You can hear death metal tunes from the early of the song, then music will be turned into some progressive type. The whole stuff is also pretty memorable thx tons of great catching tempo-changes, which will bring your mind into various soul states… Also except of prog/death metal I’ve found some heavy metal touches as well, and all these components are great mixed and sounds as one whole thing. What should you expect out from this CD? Prepare yourself to interesting technical stuff, with use of various styles, many tempo-changes, growls and solos

www.myspace.com/telemaband

name: Katalepsy/Fleshrot/Blunt Force Trauma - "Triumph of Evilution" Split CD
description:
This is one of "Must Have" CD for all fans of slam death metal.
Three extreme band joint their forces to put out this killer CD.


Katalepsy (Russia)
Fleshrot (United Kingdom)
Blunt Force Trauma (Japan)

name: Fleshbomb - "Abdominal Self-Mutilation"
description: SFC provide only Hi-quality printing!!!

name: Unborn Suffer - "Desecrate/Retaliate/Obliterate"
description:
The game these guys play and sometimes resembles Vader or Brutal Truth, is spotless: full of energy, full of twists, full of tightly played filth. The blast beat drums works overtime, although sometimes people wish it was less to get more variation.

www.myspace.com/unbornsuffer

name: Cremated Lives - "Bloodluster"
description:
Pure Death metal for fans of Dying Fetus, Skinless and such...

www.myspace.com/crematedlives

name: Viscera/// - "Cyclops"
description:
Great, incredibly underrated recording!

Viscera/// is very strong and quickly progressing experimental post-metal/post-grind band coming from Cremona, Italy. Viscera/// started as a pure grind band and transformated through experimental grindcore sound to powerful post-metal madness. Heavily influenced by late Carcass & Nasum and such well-known artcore/post-metal bands like Isis, Pelican, Neurosis and some others, Viscera/// made their own solid and spinecrushing sound which united their blasting grindcore roots with drone experiments and slow, low-tuned heaviness of extreme post-metal and sludge. "Cyclops" is their upcoming debut album and second upcoming release on Apocalypse Now Music . No need to mention that this crushing piece of experimental extreme music could be a high-rated position in catalogues of labels like Hydra Head, Relapse, Ipecac & Neurot Recordings so we're glad to be a company who discovered and introduce you another beautiful post-metal band called Viscera///.

http://www.facebook.com/viscera3stripes
www.myspace.com/detestatio

name: Virulent Blessing - "As Creativity Turns Into Lunacy"
description:
32 minutes of technical avantgarde Death Metal which have an own unique style such as other bands playing this kind of music! Its not guitar superfast sawing of heads. Death metal by Virulent Blessing have an unique atmosphere of chaos, mystery and brutality! Band formed by members of Maggottholamia takes musical influences in Death Metal, progressive rock and Black Metal to name a few genres. Bands who have broken the caps between different genres such as Opeth, Mr. Bungle, Devin Townsend & SYL, and Akercocke as well as brutal death metal bands like Devourment, Demilich and Immolation have all been very influential to this release.

www.myspace.com/virulentblessing

name: Abnormal - "Shifted the Shape"
description: ABNORMAL is a true old school death metal masterpiece from Russia in the vein of such legendary bands as Cannibal Corpse (old) and Unleashed. Mid-tempo grooves and fast blasts are put together to represent a perfect song-writing and extreme catchiness of all songs from this album. An undisputed treasure for all death metal fans!

name: Katalepsy - "Musick Brings Injuries"
description:
Here they come, a "MUST HAVE" debut CD of the most brutal and promising Russian brutal death metal act. KATALEPSY destroys mind with their crushing slamming DM sound and kills you with excellent groove riffs and amazing sound-producing. This record was produced by a well-know Russian studio-master Arkadiy Navaho (Fleshbomb, Act Of God, Grenouer, Anaemia) and presents you 7 tracks of utter guttural brutality. If you love bands like Devourment, Infected Malignity, Guttural Secrete and Waking The Cadaver, Sect of Execration... you'll be totally obsessed by their spinecrushing juicy sound. Amazing cover on Mortician's classic "Rabid" (which was featured on a current international Mortician's tribute which is out on American Line Productions) and sick artwork by famous Spanish art-maniac Phlegeton (Disgorge (Mex), Mortician, Avulsed, Impure (Spa), Wormed, Embryonic Devourment and many others) included. Featuring special bonus Katalepsy poster inside the booklet.

Listen and buy digital download: http://sfcrecords.bandcamp.com/album/musick-brings-injuries

www.myspace.com/katalepsymoscow

name: Mortalized - "Deathville"
description:
Prepare your stabwounds to bleed during zombie holocaust. MORTALIZED is a young and very gorgeous band from Kazan-city, Russia. After their strong debut on SFC on the 3-way split with Cadaveric Incubator (Fin) and Fetal Decay (Rus), boys have already done a sweet and rotting full-length record for you. "Deathville" salutes to all those who can't get enough of Mortician's "Hacked Up For Barbecue" and "Chainsaw Dismemberment". Professionally recorded and goodly produced, this perverted death/grind is what you exactly need for stabbing your guts out. Good-looking 3D cover by Satyr and informative booklet included.

www.myspace.com/mortalizedofficial

name: Amentia - "Burn to Hate"
description:
Too tired of lots of trendy guttural slam stuff? Try those raging Belarusian boys, give them a listen. You'll hear very impressive, intensive technical old-school brutal death metal in the vein of such bands like Morbid Angel, early Hate Eternal, Incantation, Diabolic, Krisiun, Dementor, and Rebaelliun. Forget about fashion; just get deep into this pure underground furious death metal. One of the best debuts on post-CIS states death-metal scene. Featuring members of cult Belarusian mincers Posthumous Blasphemer. Informative booklet, Exhumator's cover on "Crucifixion Decapitated and multimedia section with live-video on a song called "Degradation" included.

www.myspace.com/amentiabelarus

name: Unborn Suffer - "Is This What We've Created?"
description:
Another delicious peace of high-quality brutality comes from the lands of Poland. UNBORN SUFFER is a cult Polish band which combines modern death/grind influences and unites it with best moments of old-school classics like Carcass, Terrorizer, early Gorefest and so on. This is the third band's full-length album and it demonstrates you some unique kind of music that shows you what a tasty peace of meat you can get if you'll try to inject old-school to new-style one into another. Amazing sound-production and outstanding musical qualities takes UNBORN SUFFER on a new professional level. Don't loose your chance to get on with really impressing and interesting artists who are true underground freaks at heart.

www.myspace.com/unbornsuffer

name: Blood on Wedding Dress / Viscera / SMERSH / Devastathor / Scarce / EVA - Split CD
description: Only this CD uncovers the unique mix of grind, death, crust and powerviolence acts of great extreme bands from all over the world. Pure fury of BLOOD ON WEDDING DRESS from Malaysia, bloodthirsty masquerade of brutality by VISCERA from Italy, intense grinding experience of SMERSH from Russia, bonecrunching death metal by DEVASTATHOR from Czech Republic, cranial blasting asylum of SCARCE from Brazil and debut of fast’n’furious Russian band ENGORGED VAGINAL ABYSS. Unbelievable wholesale of extremities!

name: Cadaveric Incubator / Fetal Decay / Mortalized - Split CD
description: This is last 5 copies of this release! can not be added as a bonus CD Let us introduce you this sick split-commandment of three absolutely mad bands from 3 different countries. CADAVERIC INCUBATOR is a tasty Finish abnormality which features members from such well-known acts like Deepred and Torture Killer. They're butchering corpses with outstanding sound of savage gore death/grind which have its roots in a stinking legacy of early Carcass, Exhumed, Impetigo and Gruesome Malady. FETAL DECAY comes from Russia and presents you NY-style brutal death metal in the vein of early Dying Fetus and Internal Bleeding. Having one full-length album and split-CD with USA's Detrimental, those boys know how to make your head bang. MORTALIZED is a Kazakhstan breed which unchains filth with excellent Mortician-like sound and makes you feel that you're enough brave to spend a night in morgue. Don't miss this chance. Featuring amazing cover-design by Satyr, 20 tracks and 50 minutes of embalming madness, this split is definitely what you need if you want to find a good sound-track for a full-length whore-butchery.

name: Clear Jewel Box
description:
As you know, all CDs from our shop we ship without Jewel Boxs. But if you want to get all ordered CDs in Jewel Box (like they come from factory) you just need to add this product to your CART.

If you ordered more then one CD and want them shipped in jewel box, you'd add this product only once!

So if you added this Clear Jewel Box to your CART once - all your CDs will be shipped in Jewel Boxes.


PS: Don't worry, we always packaging our stuff safely (it doesn't depend on with or without Jewel Box is it)
So in any case you'll get your stuff intact!
